publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6538 Angela Constance: Congratulations on the 40th Anniversary Exhibition of the Livingston Art Association, 1970 to 2010—That the Parliament extends its best wishes to the Livingston Art Association, which is celebrating its fortieth anniversary this year; wishes it well with its celebratory exhibition; commends the commitment of the association to bringing art in all its forms into the community, and congratulates Jess Rogerson who submitted the winning painting, Scottish WildCat.
S3M-6538 Congratulations on the 40th Anniversary Exhibition of the Livingston Art Association, 1970 to 2010 (lodged on 9 June 2010) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-6538 Angela Constance: Congratulations on the 40th Anniversary Exhibition of the Livingston Art Association, 1970 to 2010—That the Parliament extends its best wishes to the Livingston Art Association, which is celebrating its fortieth anniversary this year; wishes it well with its celebratory exhibition; commends the commitment of the association to bringing art in all its forms into the community, and congratulates Jess Rogerson who submitted the winning painting, Scottish WildCat. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn
